front.title: A CGA based Source Address Authorization and Authentication (CSA) Mechanism for First IPv6 Layer-3 Hop

abstract.t: This document describes a method to authorize and authenticate theaddress of a node in an IPv6 network. Except for "Host Change", thismethod satisfies all the requirements in the Charter of SAVI. Themodification on a host can be regarded as the extension of SEND andIPSec.
